Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at AZIMUT Hotel Berlin City South in Berlin (Neukoelln), you'll be within the vicinity of Treptower Park and Checkpoint Charlie Museum. This hotel is within the vicinity of Kindl-Buhne Wuhlheide and FEZ Berlin.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 156 air-conditioned guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as a 24-hour fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Berlin? This hotel has facilities measuring 753 square feet (70 square meters), including meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Friedrichsfelde Palace - 8.5 km / 5.3 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 17.2 km / 10.7 mi

The preferred airport for AZIMUT Hotel Berlin City South is Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to AZIMUT Hotel Berlin City South are:
Berlin (SXF-Schonefeld) - 6.2 km / 3.9 mi
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 17.1 km / 10.6 mi

The preferred airport for AZIMUT Hotel Berlin City South is Berlin (SXF-Schonefeld).

Room 1
Check in time: 3pmCheck out time: 11pm
Notice
Local Charges: 5.00% city tax per booking


Please note that from the 1st January 2014 the German government will apply a 5% city tax per room, in Berlin, to all guests travelling for tourist purposes. This 5% city tax will not be included in our rates, it will be paid at time of check-out.
Note: Policies: *Berlin City Tax included in the rates from April 2015* City tax is payable by guest. Please be advised there is a fee for early departures.

Essential Information: Room 1
Tax Charges: 6.76 EUR (Excluded i.e. pay to hotel at the time of check-In)
